summary: The vikings come to Gaul and kidnap the chief's nephew. The chief sends Asterix and Obelix up north to get him back but the nephew has fallen in love with the viking chief's daughter v.v. What to do?

keywords: fat man|warrior|wild boar|hang gliding|last of series
title: Astérix y los vikingos
